Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to a reduced fare program in the metropolitan transportation authority for veterans who are students
Summary: Directs the MTA to establish a reduced fare program in the metropolitan transportation authority for veterans who are students.
LawCode: Amd ยง1266, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to a reduced fare program in the metropolitan transportation authority for veterans who are students
